# Class TextEmbedderConfigUtils

Utility functions for configuration validation and conversion.

##### Index

### Methods

fromJSON toJSON validateConfig

## Methods

### `Static`fromJSON

  * fromJSON(json: any): [TextEmbedderCreationConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_embedder_config.TextEmbedderCreationConfigInterface)

Creates a configuration from JSON format.

#### Parameters

    * json: any

JSON representation of configuration

#### Returns [TextEmbedderCreationConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_embedder_config.TextEmbedderCreationConfigInterface)

Configuration object

#### Throws

Error if JSON is invalid




### `Static`toJSON

  * toJSON(config: [TextEmbedderCreationConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_embedder_config.TextEmbedderCreationConfigInterface)): any

Converts a configuration to JSON format.

#### Parameters

    * config: [TextEmbedderCreationConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_embedder_config.TextEmbedderCreationConfigInterface)

Configuration to convert

#### Returns any

JSON representation




### `Static`validateConfig

  * validateConfig(config: [TextEmbedderCreationConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_embedder_config.TextEmbedderCreationConfigInterface)): void

Validates a text embedder configuration. Ensures all required fields are present.

#### Parameters

    * config: [TextEmbedderCreationConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_embedder_config.TextEmbedderCreationConfigInterface)

Configuration to validate

#### Returns void

#### Throws

Error if configuration is invalid
